channel.title: CVE Feed for Zyxel -- VMG8825-T50K firmware
channel.description: The latest CVEs for Zyxel -- VMG8825-T50K firmware

item.title: CVE-2024-38269|2024-09-24T13:43:24.309Z -- zyxel -- vmg8825-t50k%20firmware
item.description: An improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer in the USB file-sharing handler of the Zyxel VMG8825-T50K firmware versions through 5.50(ABOM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated attacker with administrator privileges to cause potential memory corruptions, resulting in a thread crash on an affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5412|2024-09-03T14:10:55.771Z -- zyxel -- vmg8825-t50k%20firmware
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the library "libclinkc" of the Zyxel VMG8825-T50K firmware version 5.50(ABOM.8)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause denial of service (DoS) conditions by sending a crafted HTTP request to a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-5412|2024-09-03T01:18:40.444Z -- zyxel -- vmg8825-t50k%20firmware
item.description: A buffer overflow vulnerability in the library "libclinkc" of the Zyxel VMG8825-T50K firmware version 5.50(ABOM.8)C0 could allow an unauthenticated attacker to cause denial of service (DoS) conditions by sending a crafted HTTP request to a vulnerable device.

item.title: CVE-2024-38269|2024-09-24T01:38:14.149Z -- zyxel -- vmg8825-t50k%20firmware
item.description: An improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer in the USB file-sharing handler of the Zyxel VMG8825-T50K firmware versions through 5.50(ABOM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated attacker with administrator privileges to cause potential memory corruptions, resulting in a thread crash on an affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-38266|2024-09-24T01:31:17.590Z -- zyxel -- vmg8825-t50k%20firmware
item.description: An improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer in the parameter type parser of the Zyxel VMG8825-T50K firmware versions through 5.50(ABOM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated attacker with administrator privileges to cause potential memory corruptions, resulting in a thread crash on an affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-38267|2024-09-24T01:30:45.720Z -- zyxel -- vmg8825-t50k%20firmware
item.description: An improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer in the IPv6 address parser of the Zyxel VMG8825-T50K firmware versions through 5.50(ABOM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated attacker with administrator privileges to cause potential memory corruptions, resulting in a thread crash on an affected device.

item.title: CVE-2024-38268|2024-09-24T01:35:22.675Z -- zyxel -- vmg8825-t50k%20firmware
item.description: An improper restriction of operations within the bounds of a memory buffer in the MAC address parser of the Zyxel VMG8825-T50K firmware versions through 5.50(ABOM.8)C0 could allow an authenticated attacker with administrator privileges to cause potential memory corruptions, resulting in a thread crash on an affected device.
